system.notes: Projects field outwards 2 Metres, covering user and anything close by (such as a bike or person). Whilst Active it provices Resistance(Heat) and immunity to intense flashes such as from Photon Flash Grenades. Can be used for 10 hours before requiring 5 hour recharge. Uses a backpack power supply.
